Articles.Content:
So I found out about this game via a friend of mine, and I was excited from that point forward! Bought the game a few hours 1.0 came out, so technically i came in at the beta fase ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

This game is addictive..!

Welcome!

Yes, it is very addictive. Hope you're having as much fun as I am!
Welcome aboard! May your flights be safe and your rockets un-wobbly!
Very unlike mine, where SPEED IS KEY! and wobble is paramount!

> 
> Very unlike mine, where SPEED IS KEY!

Pft, I only said they had to be safe ![:sticktongue:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue2.gif)
Highly addictive. Welcome aboard! Check out some of the excellent video channels over in [Live from Mission Control.](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/forums/53-Live-from-Mission-Control%21)
